description:
When your card game lasts longer than the sun does, this little area light will illuminate your picnic table. An option to the traditional lantern, the Ultra Mini Area Light is smaller, brighter, easy to charge, might be time to retire that lantern. Infinite dimming and 3 different light colour temperatures give you options; enjoy a little warm light to wind down the day or max bright cool white light to help get sleepy campers out of their bags.

  • 3 different white light temperatures: cool (6500K), natural (4200K), or warm (3000K)
  • Smooth dimming, just press and hold the button to dial in your perfect brightness; range: 30-500 lumens
  • SOS mode is there if things take a turn for the worse
  • Tilting rear handle and sliding hook for aiming the light
  • LED battery indicator lets you know how your battery is doing in use and while charging
  • IP64 waterproofing isn’t bothered by heavy rain
  • Easy USB-C charging, 0-100% in 6.5h
  • ¼” thread tripod mounts let you mount your light on tripods or other camera mounts
  • Dimensions: 8.5 x 6.6 x 2.7cm
  • In the box: Ultra Mini Area Light, hanger, storage pouch, USB-C charging cable, and manual
name: Claymore Ultra Mini Area Light
